statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE supplier_id = 100
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE payment_amount > 500
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date, is_late_payment FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE is_late_payment = TRUE
SELECT payment_date, supplier_id, payment_amount FROM supplier_payment_histories ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE late_payment_flag_reason IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE supplier_id = 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM supplier_payment_histories GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_payments > 5000;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment_amount FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE is_late_payment = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE payment_amount < 1000 AND is_late_payment = FALSE ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS num_payments FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM payment_date) = 9 GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING num_payments > 2;
SELECT * FROM supplier_payments;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_amount, payment_date, payment_status FROM supplier_payments;
SELECT * FROM late_payments;
SELECT supplier_id, late_payment_date, late_penalty, late_reason FROM late_payments ORDER BY late_payment_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, supplier_name, payment_date, payment_amount, payment_status FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_amount, payment_status FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' AND payment_amount >= 5000;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_date, payment_status FROM supplier_payments WHERE DATE(payment_date) = '2022-04-15';
SELECT * FROM supplier_payments;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_details;
SELECT supplier_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM supplier_payments WHERE late_payment = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM supplier_details ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_payments;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM supplier_details JOIN supplier_payments ON supplier_details.supplier_id = supplier_payments.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_details WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM supplier_payments WHERE late_payment = TRUE ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM supplier_details JOIN supplier_payments ON supplier_details.supplier_id = supplier_payments.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_payment > 1000;
SELECT * FROM supplier_details;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_details;
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, flag_status FROM payment_flag WHERE flag_status = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_details WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_details WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM late_payments WHERE late_days >= 10;
SELECT payment_id, flag_status FROM payment_flag WHERE flag_status = true;
SELECT * FROM supplier_payments;
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date, amount FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_email FROM supplier_info ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date, amount, payment_method FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_id, late_payment_date, late_reason FROM late_payments WHERE late_penalty > 100.00 ORDER BY late_payment_date ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date, payment_status FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_person, supplier_email FROM supplier_info
